citations.desc: Institutional Animal Care and Use Committee (IACUC).
citations.narrative:
A protocol approved by the IACUC on 29 March 2023 utilizing 132 ARS fish in a study, that has been completed, did not
provide a complete description of the proposed use of the animals. Protocols to conduct an activity involving animals must
contain a complete description of the proposed use of the animals so the IACUC can determine during the review and
approval process that all components of the animal use proposal are in accordance with the requirements outlined in the
Animal Welfare Act regulations. Ensure that all protocols submitted to the IACUC for review contain a complete
description of the proposed use of animals, so that the IACUC can review and approve animal use in the appropriate
manner. Correct from this time forward.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with Facility Representatives.
End of report.
n

narrative:
2.31(e)(3) 
   
Institutional Animal Care and Use Committee (IACUC). 
A protocol approved by the IACUC on 29 March 2023 utilizing 132 ARS fish in a study, that has been completed, did not 
provide a complete description of the proposed use of the animals. Protocols to conduct an activity involving animals must 
contain a complete description of the proposed use of the animals so the IACUC can determine during the review and 
approval process that all components of the animal use proposal are in accordance with the requirements outlined in the 
Animal Welfare Act regulations. Ensure that all protocols submitted to the IACUC for review contain a complete 
description of the proposed use of animals, so that the IACUC can review and approve animal use in the appropriate 
manner. Correct from this time forward. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with Facility Representatives. 
 
End of report. 
 
 n
